Author: playbunkico
Title: [ANN] - Playbunk ICO - Imagine fun. Experience creativity.
Body: Public sale ongoing! Join our token sale NOW. Whitepaper | Website | Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Telegram  Fun has a new home. PlayBunk ABOUT PLAYBUNK  PlayBunk is an Ethereum-based digital platform for distributing and promoting PC games and blockchain games. We are dedicated to enhancing player experiences through numerous community incentives, and equipping the next generation of developers with the tools they require to collaborate with fellow game creators and publish their games.  PlayBunk is designed and developed to provide users with a vast array of PC and blockchain games hosted on one platform. We value the discoverability of all games in our library, and we will develop our own comprehensive search algorithm so that users can discover games according to their preferences. We provide various options that developers can use to strategically advertise their games and make them more visible to their desired audience.  Want to know more? Read our whitepaper here: http://playbunk.com/files/pbwhitepaper.pdf  FEATURES  Gamers can enjoy a wide access to the content they want to play without worrying about intermediary costs. They will be able to access quality games, perform peer-to-peer transactions fairly in our user marketplace, accrue benefits from custom content creation, and participate in competitive tournaments with lower barriers of entry.  Developers and publishers can embrace their creative freedom with our decentralized freelancing platform. They will enjoy 96% profit on every game sale, a better discovery algorithm and targeted ads system for their titles, and an accommodating space for games created on the blockchain.  CREATOR’S LOUNGE  Using our decentralized freelancing platform, Creator’s Lounge, clients and freelance game creators can connect and collaborate with each other, then create and publish their games.  Game creators can upload their portfolios and details of their skill sets, while clients can post their project or job listing with specifications about what kind of results they require in the game they wish to create. They can communicate safely and directly through the messaging system provided by PlayBunk. With Creator's Lounge, game creators and clients can enjoy a broader access to collaborators.  We want your voice to be heard. Bring your vision to life with Creator’s Lounge.    BUNK TOKENS  The BUNK Token, based on the ERC-20 token standard and fully supported by Ethereum, is carefully structured to boost and maximize the potential of our platform. We will accommodate the ease of user purchases by making all transactions open to numerous uses within PlayBunk.  Any game on the platform can be bought using BUNK tokens. BUNK tokens can also be acquired by players in-game. Tokens acquired in one game can still be used in another, as long as both games are on PlayBunk. Developers will use BUNK tokens as the currency for their titles’ in-game transactions. All purchases within the user-driven marketplace will use BUNK tokens. Payment for game creators utilizing Creator’s Lounge will also use BUNK. PlayBunk tournaments will reward players with tokens whenever they win in different competitions.  The token will have a multitude of uses, which will incentivize our third-party developers to adopt it into their games.  TOKEN DISTRIBUTION  Allocation     40% = Token Sale     25% = Advisors & Strategic Partnerships     20% = Long-term Reserve     10% = Team & Investors     5% = Reward & Bounty  Distribution Details 40% will be sold to participants during the Public Sale Period. 25% will be used to engage strategic partnerships with developers, publishers, and advisors that will help boost interest and generate content on the PlayBunk platform. They are subject to a lock-up of 25% of the BUNK Tokens released 6 months after the initial distribution, and 50% of the BUNK Tokens released 12 months after the initial distribution. 20% will be used for long-term reserve for the operating and marketing budgets. 10% will be rewarded to the team and investors of Dog Beard Games. 5% will be used for reward and bounty programs, which are community members and influencers who will help raise awareness for PlayBunk platform.  For more information, please visit our Website.  BOUNTY PROGRAM  In order to increase awareness of the platform and market it to a wider audience, we are arranging a bounty program for interested participants. These participants will be able to acquire BUNK tokens in exchange for promoting our platform.  For those who want to become bounty participants, you can read more about our program HERE. TALK TO US Whitepaper | Website | Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Telegram  POWERED BY DOG BEARD GAMES.

Title: [ANN] - Playbunk ICO - Imagine fun. Experience creativity.
Body: Hi everyone! Just added the PlayBunk ICO to my website https://concourseq.io/Q/PlayBunk. ConcourseQ is a collaborative due diligence community that researches and reviews ICOs. Anyone with an account can submit information to your page, so we are reaching out to this community to get you all involved in the discussion. Thanks! PS: If you have any questions about filling in the info, feel free to ask us in our discord group: https://discord.gg/j8RBAwB
